name: gov-ts-backend-template
description: Government Digital Services - Typescript Backend Template
author: Ant Addis

scripts.db-reset: rm -rf prisma/generated/ prisma/migrations/ prisma/ts-template.db && npx prisma format && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && npx prisma generate
scripts.docker:migrate: docker run --rm -e DATABASE_URL="file:/data/ts-template.sqlite" -v "$(pwd)/data:/data" fst-api npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.docker:build-run: yarn docker:build && yarn docker:migrate && yarn docker:seed && yarn docker:run
scripts.dev:migrate: kamal app exec -d dev "yarn prisma migrate deploy"
scripts.dev:deploy: kamal deploy -d dev && yarn dev:migrate && yarn dev:seed
scripts.demo:migrate: kamal app exec -d demo "yarn prisma migrate deploy"
scripts.demo:deploy: kamal deploy -d demo && yarn demo:migrate && yarn demo:seed
